text: Aur woh kaun hai jisne zameen ko jaye qaraar banaya aur uske andar dariya rawan kiye, aur usmein (pahadon ki) mekhein gaadh di aur pani ke do zakhiron(two bodies) ke darmiyan purda hayal kardiye? Kya Allah ke saath koi aur khuda bhi (in kaamon mein shareek) hai? Nahin, balke in mein se aksar log nadaan hain
